content: Certainly! In a dream, time can feel distorted, slow and unpredictable - sometimes it seems to drag on forever, and other times events move quickly and chaotically. Similarly, in a story with a dream-like atmosphere, the pacing may be slow and meandering, without a clear sense of time passing, creating an otherworldly feeling. The reader is drawn into the enchanted world of the Beast's castle, where things are not quite as they seem, and they may feel a sense of disorientation or enchantment that mirrors the effect of a vivid dream. This dreamlike atmosphere can contribute to a sense of magic and wonder that is central to the magical realism genre.
